thread.title: Which Of These Newly Discovered Planets Would You Like To Live On After Fleeing Our Hellish Earth?
thread.title_full: Which Of These Newly Discovered Planets Would You Like To Live On After Fleeing Our Hellish Earth?

author: Tom Ley on The Concourse, shared by Tom Ley to Deadspin
title: Which Of These Newly Discovered Planets Would You Like To Live On After Fleeing Our Hellish Earth?
text:
Go to permalink 
Did you hear the good news? NASA found some new Earth-sized exoplanets that aren’t that far away. There might be aliens on them! Or maybe we’ll be able to live on them someday! Either way, there’s no harm in doing some early planning. After a deluge of teasing press releases and premature speculation, we can finally share some Very… Read more Read more 
Okay, so, which one do you want to live on? Image: NASA/JPL-Caltech 
I’m partial to F because because it looks like a cooler version of Earth. D looks like it has some Endor vibes so I’m down with that one, and I’m also digging whatever G has going on. Is that a green ocean? I could get used to a green ocean. Advertisement 
H and C can go to hell, in my opinion. 
Please tell me which planet you want to live on and why.
